summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sharda HR HRMS KPI Performance module. Successfully verified all requested features: Fill KPI dialog with score sliders and comment fields, template editing with dropdown options, and complete KPI workflow from creation to submission. Both backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend functionality are working perfectly.
passed_tests: Backend API Testing - 12/12 tests passed (100% success rate)
Admin login with provided credentials (admin@shardahr.com / Admin@123)
Fill KPI functionality - dialog opens with questions, score sliders, and comment fields
KPI response saving - 'Save Responses' button works correctly
Template editing - questions are fully editable (text, max points, category)
Answer Type dropdown - successfully changed to 'Dropdown Options'
Add Option button appears when dropdown type is selected
Dropdown options creation with label and points functionality
Template saving - 'Save Changes' button works correctly
Score sliders with proper range (0-max points) for score-type questions
Comment fields available for all question types
Template management with different question types (score, dropdown, text)
Dropdown options with points assignment working correctly
